document.full_text: meir dagan said that with recent retirements, including his own, 'there is no one to stop' the prime minister and defense chief from making rash decisions.
document.title: a former spy chief questions the judgment of israeli leaders
lines_and_colors: meir dagan said that with recent retirements, including his own, 'there is no one to stop' the prime minister and defense chief from making rash decisions.
